entry.title: [ANN] 0.10.0rc2 has been tagged
entry.summary: The latest version of Bitcoin, 0.10.0rc2, has been tagged on git. This update includes changes that are required for interoperability with OpenSSL 1.0.1k. Notable changes relative to the previous version include improvements in robustness, bug fixes, and updates to seed IPs based on bitcoin.sipa.be crawler data. The release notes detail the changes made in this update, which include catching UTXO set read errors, introducing a 10-minute block download timeout, improving the robustness of DER recoding code, failing immediately on an empty signature, bumping OpenSSL to 1.0.1k, and more. The release notes also provide instructions for fetching, building, and testing the new version.
